availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Harrison Rose (Grant County, Kentucky, carpenter)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Rose. Father of William H. Rose, John F. Rose, Margaret A. Rose, Sarah H. Rose, James E. Rose, Charles R. Rose, Nancy F. Rose, Emma C. Rose. Carpenter in Grant County in 1850. Carpenter in Grant County in 1860. Arrested for burglary with his son William in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant, p. 317A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant, p. 896.
KYR-0001-004-0061.
